channel.title: How do i add drops to pking?
channel.description: So On my server i can type ::wildy and teles to pk area but when we kill someone they lose nothing and we get no drops and im wondering how to make it so when they die we can get pvp drops or soemthing?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2009, 01:02:50 pm[/size][hr]No answers please i need help!!!!
